lyrics.text:
’Oku tau ‘ilo totonu
‘I he folofola,
Ko ‘etau motu’a anga,
‘Oku kovi ia.

He ‘oku tupu mei ai,
‘Etau vilingia
Ki he ngaahi me’a kovi
Fakamala’ia.

Ko e fai fakakakano,
Mo e holi kovi,
Ko hotau mahaki’ia,
Fakalaumālie.

Ko ia ‘oku ‘aonga ai,
‘A ‘etau tokanga;
Ki he fekau ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ko hotau ‘Otua.

Pea kumi ke tau ‘ilo,
‘Ene ‘ofa lahi;
‘E he kakai tō ki lalo,
Pea tu’utāmaki.
